page.title: 03The High Peak Trail
page.content: The High Peak Trail originally linked Cromford and Peak Forests canals.Horse drawn then steam pulled trains were used.Now bought by the County Council it goes from Cromford to Buxton and is used for{walking,biking,picnicking, { rock climbing,horse riding}and {attracting tourists.} We think it is good because you can use it{any time}you want.Old buildings ,inclines,embankments,bridges and other remains are interesting.It goes over some spectacular scenery.Because in holiday times the volume of visitors increases the trail is patrolled by Country_side Rangers whose jobs include planting trees and cleaning up the country side.They often involve local schools and communities.For example our class planted 100 trees.
